Can't reply to the person you asked who is who so will post this.
If you pause at 3.28 (left to right)

(20), Suga/Yoongi(e) (22), Jungkook/Kookie (18) and Rapmonster/Namjoon 
(21). But there is the introduction at the start so not sure why anyone 
needs a list? BTW ages are this year's so some have turned that age and 
others haven't.﻿

comments.text:
I'm glad you liked it so much! No it's not me but I thought he'd be the 
best intro for you- he was taught by the bodhran player in Beoga and is 
amazing. I'm actually a woman lol but yea could see why you'd think that 
Jack was me. Looked up 'Begena'. It's interesting and quite fascinates me 
because it reminds me of an Irish tune. The annoying thing is I can't 
remember it's name at all to give you the link or anything. Just shows you 
though that people might just get inspiration from everywhere. Maybe your 
tune inspired this? I'm presuming it's a lot older than the one about which 
I'm thinking!
comments.author: Multidimensional

comments.text:
+Multidimensional omg are you kidding that was dope! Was that you playing?! 
I can't really play any instruments unfortunately but I'm obsessed with 
musical instruments! And now I got a new one to obsess over! Bodhran!!
Oh and BTW check out the instrument "Begena" it sounds more similar to this 
than "Kirar"! But the song might seem creepy to you since it's not your 
language (it even creeps me out) but the sound the instrument makes is 
really cool!

comments.author: K-popLover EXOticA.R.M.Y

comments.text:
Honestly the first time i heard this song i was a bit skeptical. At first i 
wasnt much of a fan of bts. I always thought this song was just them 
rapping and having fun and it never really meant much. As time passed by, i 
listened to more of their songs and i got to know bts more and more. What 
each member was like and the relationship they had with each other. No more 
dream was the first song i heard from bts. Every now and then i would hear 
it playing and each time i grew to love it. So i decided to watch the mv 
one more time.... my thoughts about this song completely changed. The 
english captions were on and with each line they rapped/sang i realized 
that this wasn't just another pre written song that was given to them with 
no meaning. It was a song with a message to open your eyes and dream and 
chase it. I realized from past videos of bts that the lyrics were from 
their experiences and feelings and thoughts put into a song. This song also 
made me realize that i shouldn't let my parents dictate my life for me. Im 
going to chase after what i really want instead of lying to my self and 
saying that i want to be a stupid lawyer with no passion. So basically, 
thank you Kim Taehyung, Jeon Jungkook, Park Jimin, Min Yoongi, Kim Seokjin, 
Kim Namjoon, and Jung Hoseok for your amazing music and inspiration. Thank 
you for making me realize thay its my life and no one else's. Thank you, 
and i love you all!﻿
